measure.name: Increase R-value of Insulation for Exterior Walls to a Specific Value
measure.description: This measure adjusts the R-value of the insulation layer in all exterior wall constructions to a specified target value.
measure.modeler_description: This measure searches for all exterior wall constructions in the model, identifies the insulation layer (based on the highest R-value), and updates or replaces it to achieve the specified R-value. Optionally, it can also add lifecycle costs.

argument.name: allow_reduction
argument.display_name: Allow both increase and decrease in R-value to reach requested target?

argument.name: material_cost_increase_ip
argument.display_name: Increase in Material and Installation Costs ($/ft²)

argument.name: years_until_retrofit_cost
argument.display_name: Year to Incur One Time Retrofit Cost
